mapper.select: /* 동양시스템 설비기준 최신시간 온도모니터링 리스트 (mpMapper.getTmpr17List) */ select a.spot_no --작업장번 , a.spot_nm --작업장명 , b.rcv_msg --메세지 , b.rcv_tmpr --측정온도 , to_char(to_timestamp(b.unix_hms) ,'HH:MM:SS') as rcv_tm --수신시각 from spot_info a join tmpr_log b on a.spot_no = b.spot_no and b.used_yn = 'Y' and b.cust_no = a.cust_no join (select spot_no, max(unix_hms) as unix_hms from tmpr_log where used_yn = 'Y' and cust_no = #{custNo} group by spot_no ) c on b.spot_no = c.spot_no and b.unix_hms = c.unix_hms where a.used_yn = 'Y' and a.cust_no = #{custNo} order by spot_nm
